page.title: 14POP FANS IN LAINDON
page.content: Pop music amplifies from local community centres where young people are disco dancing or even playing live music in their own groups or bands. There are several different kinds of music at the moment such as soul, pop and heavy metal. {Soul} Soul is funky, disco type music. "Shakatak" are a soul group. {Pop} Pop is popular music. "Wham" are one of the most famous groups at the moment. Girls in our school wear tee-shirts with pictures of "Wham" printed on them. They also decorate their bedroom walls with magazine pictures of the group. {Heavy Metal } Heavy Metal is sort of loud, drummy, rock music. "Iron Maiden" are a heavy metal group.
